entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 07:45 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
